Keywords are so important that they can boost or reduce your entire rankings. In other words: To succeed with Amazon KDP, you need to find the right keywords and spend time on KDP Keyword Research.
What are the right keywords, exactly? Do you need any paid tools or Chrome Extensions to find them? In my opinion: "No, You Don't Need!".
This video will teach you everything you need to know about Amazon KDP Keyword Research step by step without using any paid tools or Chrome extensions.
